Articles.Content:
im having a bug where when i launch the game with a aircraft that has an electric propeller engine, the whole world deleted bug with nan speed and more happens. in the log is something with the word instances, how a number cannot be infinity or nan, and another thing with viewing vector equals zero. electric helicopter rotors work fine, its just with electric engines. maybe its with the fact that, electricity, because it is weightless, is affecting it somehow? but idk, im pretty sure this bug may have been encountered before but am not sure. help?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-29T03:48:21Z" title="07/29/2015 03:48  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 29, 2015</time> by 123nick**
its so wierd, before electric propellers and engines in general now, i think, used to work perfectly. now they dont?

People will need the actual logs in order to help you. Please make absolutely sure all your mods are up to date, and then follow the steps here:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)
